backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining data models, access control, storage mixins, and CRUD-style queries for profiles, organization details, about content, projects, and gallery images.
feature_evidence.json: Structured feature-evidence report mapping features to source files, components, and test IDs for deployment and validation.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of major frontend components, pages, hooks, and contexts.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide outlining IC deployment steps, hash-based routing behavior, and post-deployment verification checklist.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry file setting up the root container and bootstrapping the frontend via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router with hash-based routing, page routes, providers, and global app wrappers.
frontend/src/components/admin/AboutUsEdi: Admin editor for About Us text in English and Hindi with tabbed inputs and save handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/ContactMes: Displays contact form submissions with metadata and message content.
frontend/src/components/admin/GalleryMan: Admin tool to upload, preview, caption, list, and delete gallery images.
frontend/src/components/admin/HomePageIm: Admin interface for adding, previewing, captioning, and deleting homepage images.
frontend/src/components/admin/Organizati: Admin form to edit organization info, mission text, and logo with upload and removal support.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProjectsMa: Admin UI for listing, creating, editing, and deleting projects with multilingual text and image upload support.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying bilingual organization info, contact details, social links, and a logo with fallback handling.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with navigation links, language toggle, authentication controls, and fallback logo handling.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Wraps the app layout with header, footer, and routed content outlet.
frontend/src/contexts/AuthContext.tsx: Provides admin authentication state, credential validation, login/logout handlers, and persistent session storage.
frontend/src/contexts/LanguageContext.ts: Stores and provides current language preference and a helper for selecting English or Hindi text.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login/logout handling, identity persistence, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating organization details, about content, projects, and gallery images via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light/dark color tokens and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry setting up React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Displays multilingual About Us content fetched from the backend with loading and fallback behavior.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLoginPage.tsx: Handles admin login and firstâ€‘time admin setup with credential validation and redirects authenticated users to the admin panel.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Displays the admin dashboard with tabs for managing site content and validates access based on authentication status.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Shows organization contact details and a form that submits messages via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Fetches and displays gallery images with captions based on the selected language.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage hero section, mission info, and recent activity images using organization data and homepage images.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Provides a 404 page with navigation options to common site routes.
frontend/src/pages/ProjectsPage.tsx: Displays a multilingual projects grid, fetching project data and rendering cards with images, titles, and descriptions.
frontend/src/utils/domainValidation.ts: Provides functions to validate and normalize custom domains with checks for length, format, and allowed characters.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, supporting query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, animations, and container settings with additional plugins.
project_state.json: Project state file describing current features, domain validation issues, and pending feature requests.
